name: USCoreClinicalTestCodes
title: US Core Clinical Test Codes
description: Non laboratory LOINC concepts such as codes for observations like vital signs, hemodynamics, intake/output, EKG, obstetric ultrasound, cardiac echo and other clinical observations. The codes selected should represent discrete and narrative diagnostic observations and reports
